title: [D+] Ayy Lmua competitive OOL team LFM.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/rCtqlRo.png
Ayy Lmua is a competitive esports organization looking to compete for OCS in the second split of OOL 2017.
The goal is to create two teams to compete and practice side by side.
If you're competitively driven and willing to consistently practice and scrim apply using the form below.
https://goo.gl/forms/GWEZo2EsveKqbo5L2

For team 1 we're recruiting
Top
Jungle
Middle
Coach

For team 2 we're recruiting
Top
Jungle
Middle
ADC
Support
Coach

Cheers, Flip.

replies.body: Applied not sure how you respond too the applications without an email etc?
I'm guessing they'll likely add 'em in game.
